item.title: Huge hole !, 12th December

item.title: Entry door not locking/ beeping, 11th December
item.description:

item.title: Overflowing bin, 11th December
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Southwold Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Water leak, 11th December
item.description:
There appears to be a water leak from somewhere causing water to stream down the western side of St Paul's Cray Road and into Orpington Road. Please investigate.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St Pauls Cray Road, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: 3 street lights out, 11th December
item.description:
Three street lights are out on Bexley Road, one before and one after bus stop AL and one opposite. Two of the lampposts also have flags hanging off them, which should be removed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bexley Road, Eltham

item.title: 85 Chesterfield Grove Flytipping (along the wall) 4th Complaint, 11th December
item.description:
4th complaint. Wooden crate/pallet has still not been removed. This is a health and safety hazard as it could fall over and injure a pedestrian as well as it is fly tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 25, Chesterfield Grove, East Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Car with no reg plates dumped on public road 11Dec25, 11th December
item.description:
Photos taken 11th December 2025. As depicted there’s an old car, with flat tyres and generally in a bad state, on a public parking spot at the Barnfield Estate with no registration plates. The car bears a striking resemblance to one of the same make, same colour, in the same spot that was SORN…

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Keeble Close, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet
